text: Leposoma baturitensis is a species of lizard in the family Gymnophthalmidae. It is endemic to Brazil. ==References== Category:Leposoma Category:Reptiles of Brazil Category:Endemic fauna of Brazil Category:Reptiles described in 1997 Category:Taxa named by Miguel Trefaut Rodrigues Category:Taxa named by Diva Maria Borges-Nojosa
title: Leposoma baturitensis
